The Railway Men-The Untold Story Of Bhopal 1984

2023 | 1 Seasons | Drama

After a deadly gas leaks from a factory in Bhopal, brave railway workers risk their lives risk their lives to save others in the face of an unspeakable diaster.

Starring: R.Madhavan, Kay Menon,Divyennadu
